Contact¶

Mailing list¶

You can share your user experiment with PAGO community be sending an email to pago-users@groupes.renater.fr mailing list.

Moderation is set for non members on this list to avoid spams.

Join this list by send an email to sympa@groupes.renater.fr with this following subject:

subscribe pago-users Firstname Lastname

Archives are accessible to members only.
